want-coffee.text:
Olga: That is very kind of you; actually yes, I would love a coffee.

Olga: It has been a stressful day, there is this new project and you know how it is, we got it just today but it should have been finished yesterday.

about-new-project.text: Olga: This is concerning the new project, it seems like William wants you to jump into it. So the sooner you get to talk to him the better.

options.text: I'm fine, just warming up on Monday morning

another-coffee.text:
A third coffee in the morning seems like stressing it too much, but then again it has been a busy morning so far.

While operating the espresso machine Olga approaches you.

Olga: Good to see you, how are you doing?

options.text: (Go to the kitchen and get yourself another coffee)

initial.text:
11:00 hours Monday, Playfair Architects, Kreuzberg.

You finally managed to get through the huge pile of documents on your desk accumulated through the weekend, and you just drank your second coffee.

It seems that Olga is just stepping out of William's office and apparently she is heading your way.

william-office.text:
William's office is the buzz of the building, there is never a dull moment in here. It seems that Mr Playfair does not stop, rest or take a break, not even for lunch.

He seems concentrated deeply reading a document.

options.text: I'm just hopping we don't have this the rest of the week
Busy for you too? Maybe I can help

still-busy.text: Olga: It has been a busy Monday right?

options.text: I'm sure there is some way I can help you out
Just assign some tasks to me and I will help

olgas-weekend.text: Olga: I stayed at home and advanced with some of the work, which was fine because today has been a stressful. We got this new project a few hours ago but it should have been finished yesterday, as always.

options.text: Do you know what is it about?

by-the-way.text: Olga: By the way, William wanted to talk to you. Please drop by his office.

options.text: Work is not going to be done by itself

life-tough.text: Olga: Yeah, no point on being just complaining about. We have a new project and we have to deal with it.

options.text: Can't you see I'm all drowned in paperwork?
Sounds good, what is it about?

options.text: You know me, wild as it gets
I stayed at home and did some more work

approach-olga.text: Olga: Oh! so nice to see you. How was your weekend?
